H0.text: Which religion's holy book is the Adi Granth. Hinduism

H1.text: Which religion's holy book is the Adi Granth. Buddhism

H2.text: Which religion's holy book is the Adi Granth. Jainism

H3.text: Which religion's holy book is the Adi Granth. Sikhi

A4.text: The Guru Granth Sahib (Punjabi: â€¦) is the central holy religious scripture of Sikhism, regarded by Sikhs as the final, sovereign and eternal Guru following the lineage of the ten human gurus of the religion.

A5.text: While the Granth acknowledges and respects the scriptures of Hinduism and Islam, it does not imply a moral reconciliation with either of these religions.
